title: Extended the framework for the Russian Vine. siv #18

tasks.task: Performing maintenance and garden-related tasks at a farm.
subtasks: Checking and managing chickens and their eggs.
Ensuring the safety and proper placement of ducks.
Clearing and maintaining garden areas, including trimming vines and adjusting garden structures.
Addressing structural challenges with garden trellises and frameworks.
Securing garden meshes and extending protective barriers.
Addressing issues with bees and managing their access to garden areas.
Caring for agricultural tools and equipment necessary for garden maintenance.
Documenting progress and changes in the garden through video recording.
